name: Monday Blues
description:
Description

Monday Blues is a game about managing multiple windows while only being able to view one task at a time. You must answer emails, your direct messages, and balance playing a game all while making sure your download finishes without error. If you wait too long the install will fail and reset. Do your best to balance and one day you'll be free.

Available to play only on Windows

Only One

Monday Blues meets the Only One theme by presenting a multitasking game where you can only view one window/application at a time.

Controls

Click application icons on the task bar at the bottom of the screen to switch between applications. Each application continues to run in the background so you will need to switch often.

Download: hit the download button to begin and when the download stalls.

Email: requires clicking the appropriate button prompt to reply

Chatter: click the text box and type keys to automatically write a response and press post

Driving Game: press up or down directional buttons to switch between lanes to avoid crashing into other cars

Story

"We've just received a firmware update I.T.

Since I know you've got a family to go back to I'll let you go on your way as soon as you finish installing this update.

We've had some tech issues recently, so all applications must run in full screen. Keep an eye on the update but remember to do your job and answer emails too.

- Boss Dude Person"
